title: Made a mistake in Fateha, must I repeat my prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: of fatiha i made a mistake instead of being sort of laziness and a day after i remember that i made this mistake so should i repeat the salah or what should i do yes if you are certain that you have made such a mistake that changes the meaning of the fatiha you your prayer is invalid a levina is plur pooler so guide us to this a straight path of those whom you have favored those if you said guide us to the straight path of that or of whom for a singular person you've changed the meaning definitely and the prairie is invalid and lano's best
